IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: To provide a full range of living options, high-quality health services,and individualized care plans designed to respect older adults' varied interests, abilities, and needs and promote independence and well-being.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To provide a full range of living options, high-quality health services, and individualized care plans designed to respect older adults' varied interests, abilities and needs and promote independence and well-being.
IRS990.Description: Long term care facility with 39 skilled nursing care beds, 62 assisted living units, and 24 assisted living Alzheimer's beds and 37 independent living cottages. Provide care to Medicare, Maincare, private pay and other insured patients.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Quarry Hill maintains endowment assets that attempt to provide a predictable stream of funding to the programs supported by those assets.
Other liabilities includes a balance due to affiliates, third party settlements and the current portion of long term debt.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Form 990 is carefully prepared by one individual and reviewed by two others. It is presented to the organization's Finance Committee before filing.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: At the beginning of Board Service members are required to document any conflict of interest that may exist, and they are required to report any additional conflicts that may arise.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Executive compensation is reviewed and approved annually by the Board of Trustees, provided that persons with a conflict of interest with respect to the compensation arrangement at issue are not involved. Use of data as to comparable compensation for similarly qualified persons in functionally comparable positions at similar organizations is used in the decision process.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization does not make its governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the publiconly uppon request.
